Our social media handles are in the 'About Us' section of the app. Give us a follow for the latest news!

intents.description: User asks about job openings or careers at the company.
responses: Interested in joining the SmartServe team? Please visit the 'Careers' section on our website to see current openings.
We're always looking for talented people! Check out our LinkedIn page for the latest job postings and internship opportunities.
For career inquiries, please email your resume to careers@smartserve.ai. We'd love to hear from you!

intents.description: User asks about an affiliate or partnership program.
responses: We have an exciting affiliate program! You can earn commissions by referring customers. Sign up on our website under the 'Partners' section.
Interested in partnering with SmartServe? Please contact our partnerships team at partners@smartserve.ai for more details.
Affiliates can earn up to 10% per booking. For more information, visit the 'Affiliate' link at the bottom of our homepage.

intents.description: User asks about how their data is handled or privacy policy.
responses: Your privacy is important to us. You can read our full Privacy Policy and Terms of Service on our website or in the app under 'Legal'.
We use industry-standard encryption to protect your data. We never share your personal information without your consent.
For details on how we handle your information, please see our Privacy Policy. It explains your rights and our data practices clearly.

intents.description: User wants to suggest a new service category not currently offered.
text: i need a service not listed
responses: Thank you for the suggestion! We're always looking to expand. Which service category would you like to see added?
We love hearing from our users! Please let me know what service you're looking for, and I'll pass it on to our product team.
Your feedback helps us grow. While we may not have that specific service yet, we are constantly adding new categories. What did you have in mind?

intents.description: User wants to give general feedback about the app.
responses: We appreciate your feedback! You can leave us a review on the App Store or Google Play, or tell me your thoughts right here.
Thank you for helping us improve! Please share your suggestion, and I'll make sure our team sees it.
We'd love to hear your ideas! What feature would make your experience better?

intents.description: User forgot their password and needs help resetting it.
responses: No problem! On the login screen, tap 'Forgot Password?' and enter your email. You'll receive a link to reset it.
To reset your password, go to the login page and click 'Forgot Password'. Follow the instructions sent to your registered email.
If you're having trouble logging in, use the 'Forgot Password' option. If you still can't access your account, please contact support.

intents.description: User wants to change the email address associated with their account.
responses: You can update your email address in 'My Account' > 'Profile Settings'. A verification link will be sent to your new email.
To change your email, go to your profile and edit the email field. Please ensure you have access to the new email for verification.
Need to update your email? Go to 'Account Settings' and select 'Change Email'. Let me know if you encounter any issues.

intents.description: User wants to update their mobile phone number.
responses: You can update your phone number in 'My Account' > 'Profile Settings'. You'll receive an OTP to verify the new number.
To change your mobile number, go to your profile and edit the phone field. A verification code will be sent to your new number.
Need to update your contact number? Navigate to 'Account Settings' and select 'Change Phone Number'.

intents.description: User wants to add a new address to their profile.
responses: You can add a new address in 'My Account' > 'Saved Addresses'. This helps us find providers near you faster.
To add a new address, go to your profile and tap on 'Addresses'. You can save multiple locations like Home, Office, etc.
Managing your addresses is easy! Go to 'My Account' and select 'Addresses' to add, edit, or remove locations.

intents.description: User wants to permanently delete their account.
responses: We're sorry to see you go. You can request account deletion from 'My Account' > 'Settings' > 'Delete Account'. Please note this action is permanent.
To delete your account, please go to the app settings and select 'Delete Account'. You'll need to confirm your password.
Account deletion requests are processed within 48 hours. Before you go, is there anything we could have done better?

intents.description: User asks about cashback offers or deals.
responses: We regularly run cashback offers! Check the 'Offers' section in the app for the latest deals on bookings.
Some payment methods may offer cashback. You can see applicable cashback at the time of payment.
Keep an eye on your notifications! We often send exclusive cashback offers to our regular customers.

intents.description: User asks if providers are insured or covered by insurance.
responses: All our vetted professionals are required to have liability insurance for your protection. Details are on their profile.
We require all service providers to carry valid insurance. In the rare event of damage, you are covered by our service guarantee.
Yes, providers on our platform are insured. You can check the 'Insurance Verified' badge on their profile for peace of mind.

intents.description: User asks for emergency contact or helpline numbers.
responses: For emergencies, please call our 24/7 helpline at 1-800-555-0199. For life-threatening situations, please contact local emergency services first.
Our emergency support line is available around the clock. You can find the number in the 'Help' section of the app.
If this is a safety emergency during a service, please use the in-app 'SOS' button to alert our security team immediately.

intents.description: User inquires about setting up a corporate or business account.
responses: We offer special corporate accounts for businesses. Please visit our website and click on 'Corporate' to speak with a sales representative.
For bulk bookings and corporate billing, you can sign up for a business account. Contact our corporate team at corporate@smartserve.ai.
Corporate clients enjoy dedicated account managers and invoicing. Please fill out the 'Business Inquiry' form in the app.

intents.description: User asks if the company is involved in any charity or community work.
responses: We're proud to give back! We partner with local non-profits to provide free services to underserved communities. Learn more on our blog.
SmartServe supports various community initiatives. Check out our 'Impact' page on the website to see how we're making a difference.
Yes, we have a 'Service for Good' program. A portion of every booking goes towards funding community projects.

intents.description: User asks about the latest app version or update.
responses: The current version of the app is 3.5.0. You can check for updates in your device's App Store or Google Play Store.
To get the latest features and bug fixes, make sure you're on the most recent version. Go to the app store and tap 'Update'.
We regularly release updates! You can see the 'What's New' section in the app store when an update is available.

intents.description: User asks about accessibility features for users with disabilities.
responses: Our app is designed with accessibility in mind. It is compatible with screen readers and supports dynamic text sizing.
We are committed to making our platform accessible to everyone. If you have specific needs, please let us know so we can assist.
For information on accessibility features, please visit our website's accessibility statement or contact our support team.

intents.description: User asks when a service will be available in their city.
text: when will you come to my city
responses: We are rapidly expanding! Which city are you in? I can check if we have plans to launch there soon.
Our goal is to be nationwide. Please leave your city name with our team, and we'll notify you when we launch there.
We're currently in major metropolitan areas. If you don't see your city, sign up for notifications on our website to be the first to know!

intents.description: Provider asks if the app provides tools or materials for the job.
responses: Providers are expected to bring their own professional tools and equipment for the job.
The platform connects you with customers, but you are responsible for providing the necessary tools for your trade.
We do not supply tools. Please ensure you have all required equipment before accepting a booking.

intents.description: User asks how long a service or job will take.
responses: The duration depends on the complexity of the job. The provider will give you an estimated time of arrival and completion before starting.
You can discuss the timeline with your chosen provider. Most standard services like cleaning or repairs take 1-3 hours.
For an accurate estimate, please provide more details about the job, or the provider will assess it upon arrival.

intents.description: Provider wants to bid or apply for a customer's posted job.
responses: To view and bid on open jobs, go to your provider dashboard and tap on 'Find Work' or 'Browse Jobs'.
You can see all available customer requests in your area from the 'Jobs' tab. Make sure your service categories match the request.
Bidding is easy! Just select a job, review the requirements, and send your quote and a message to the customer.

intents.description: Provider accepts a booking or job.
responses: Great! You've accepted the job. The customer will be notified and you can now message them for details.
Job accepted! Please ensure you arrive on time. You can view the customer's address in the booking details.
Accepted! Remember to communicate with the customer if you're running late or need clarification.

intents.description: Provider declines a job.
responses: No problem! The job will be offered to other providers. Thank you for letting us know.
Job declined. Your availability remains unchanged for other offers.
Understood. If your schedule frees up, you can always browse other open jobs.

intents.description: Provider notifies that they have arrived at the location.
responses: Thank you for updating! The customer will be notified that you've arrived.
Great! Please tap 'Start Job' when you begin the work.
Noted. Have a successful service!

intents.description: Provider starts the service.
responses: Job started! We've notified the customer. You can contact them if needed.
Work begun. Remember to mark the job as complete when you're done.
Great! Let us know if you encounter any issues.

intents.description: Provider finishes the job.
responses: Excellent! Please confirm the final amount with the customer if applicable. The customer will be prompted to rate the service.
Thank you for completing the job. Your payment will be processed according to the schedule.
Well done! The customer will receive a completion notification and can leave a review.

intents.description: Provider requests payment from customer (for cash jobs).
responses: You can send a payment request to the customer via the booking chat. They'll receive a notification to complete the payment.
For cash jobs, you can mark the payment as collected in the app. For online, the customer pays through the platform.
Please confirm with the customer that the work is satisfactory before requesting payment.

intents.description: Provider marks a cash payment as received.
responses: Great! The booking is now marked as paid. Thank you for using SmartServe.
Payment confirmed. The transaction will reflect in your earnings shortly.
Thank you! You can view this payment in your earnings report.

intents.description: Provider reports that customer hasn't paid.
responses: I'm sorry to hear that. Please try to resolve it with the customer first. If the issue persists, you can raise a dispute from the booking page.
Unpaid jobs can be reported to our support team. Please provide details, and we'll investigate.
You can send a reminder to the customer through the app. If they still don't pay, contact support for assistance.

intents.description: Provider wants to dispute a payment or review.
text: i want to dispute a payment
responses: To dispute a payment or review, please go to the specific booking and select 'Report an Issue'. Our team will review the case.
Disputes are taken seriously. Please provide evidence (photos, messages) to support your claim.
You can contact provider support directly via email at provider-support@smartserve.ai for dispute resolution.

intents.description: Provider checks their earnings balance.
responses: You can view your earnings in the 'Provider Dashboard' under 'Earnings'. It shows your total, pending, and paid amounts.
Your current balance is available in the app. Withdrawals can be requested once you reach the minimum threshold.
Earnings are updated after each completed booking. Check the dashboard for detailed reports.

intents.description: Provider wants to withdraw their earnings.
responses: To withdraw your earnings, go to the 'Provider Dashboard' and select 'Withdraw'. You can transfer to your linked bank account or mobile wallet.
Withdrawals are processed within 2-3 business days. Ensure your bank details are correct in your profile.
Minimum withdrawal amount is $20. You can request a payout anytime from the earnings section.

intents.description: Provider wants to update their bank account for payments.
responses: You can update your bank account details in 'Provider Settings' under 'Payout Methods'. Please double-check the account number.
To ensure timely payments, keep your bank information up to date. Changes may take 24 hours to verify.
You can add multiple payout methods (bank, mobile money) and select your preferred one for withdrawals.

intents.description: Provider asks about tax forms or reporting.
responses: Tax documents for providers are available in the 'Provider Dashboard' under 'Tax Information'. You can download your annual summary there.
For tax-related questions, please consult a professional. We provide earnings reports that you can use for filing.
If you need a 1099 form (for US providers), it will be available by January 31st each year. Update your tax info in settings.

intents.description: Provider wants to check the status of their verification.
responses: You can check your verification status in 'Provider Dashboard' under 'Verification'. It shows which documents are approved or pending.
Verification usually takes 24-48 hours. If you submitted documents recently, please allow some time for processing.
If any document was rejected, you'll see a reason and can re-upload it from the verification page.

intents.description: Provider wants to upload an ID, license, or other document.
responses: You can upload documents in 'Provider Dashboard' > 'Verification'. Accepted formats are JPG, PNG, or PDF.
Please ensure the document is clear and all details are visible. Uploading a blurry image may delay verification.
You can upload multiple documents: ID, professional license, insurance certificate, etc.

intents.description: Provider uploads insurance certificate.
responses: You can upload your insurance certificate in the verification section. This helps build trust with customers.
Insurance documents are reviewed by our team. Once approved, your profile will show an 'Insured' badge.
Please upload a valid insurance certificate with your name and coverage dates clearly visible.

intents.description: Provider wants to add a profile photo or work photos.
responses: You can add a profile photo in 'Provider Settings'. A professional photo helps customers trust you.
To upload work samples, go to your 'Portfolio' section in the provider dashboard. You can add up to 10 images.
High-quality photos of your work can attract more customers. Make sure they are clear and relevant.

intents.description: Provider wants to update their bio or description.
responses: You can edit your bio in 'Provider Settings' > 'Profile'. Tell customers about your experience and skills.
A good bio highlights your expertise and friendly approach. Keep it professional and concise.
You can update your bio anytime. Changes are immediately visible to customers.

intents.description: Provider wants to update their service prices.
responses: You can update your pricing in 'Provider Dashboard' under 'Services'. Set your hourly rate or fixed price per job.
Competitive pricing can help you get more bookings. You can also offer discounts for regular customers.
Remember to save your changes. New prices will apply to future bookings.

intents.description: Provider wants to define the area they serve.
responses: You can set your service area in 'Provider Settings' > 'Service Area'. Choose a radius from your location or specific cities.
Defining your service area ensures you only get bookings you can reach. You can also set travel fees for longer distances.
If you're willing to travel further, you can increase your radius. Keep in mind travel time and costs.

intents.description: Provider sets or asks about travel charges.
responses: You can add a travel fee in your service settings. It can be a fixed amount or based on distance.
Travel fees help cover your costs when serving customers outside your immediate area. Customers will see this before booking.
To set a travel fee, go to 'Provider Dashboard' > 'Services' > 'Travel Fee'.

intents.description: Provider wants to temporarily disable bookings (vacation mode).
responses: You can turn on 'Holiday Mode' in your provider dashboard. This will hide your profile from search results until you turn it off.
To pause new bookings, go to 'Provider Settings' and toggle 'Available for Work' off. Existing bookings are not affected.
Vacation mode activated! You can reactivate anytime. Enjoy your break!

intents.description: Provider wants to read reviews left by customers.
responses: You can view all your reviews in the 'Provider Dashboard' under 'Reviews'. Customers' feedback helps you improve.
Your average rating is displayed on your profile. Responding to reviews (especially negative ones) shows professionalism.
If you believe a review violates our guidelines, you can report it for review by our team.

intents.description: Provider wants to reply to a customer's review.
responses: You can reply to reviews from the 'Reviews' section. Select the review and tap 'Reply'. Keep your response professional.
Replying to reviews shows you value customer feedback. It can also clarify any misunderstandings.
Your reply will be public. Be respectful even if the review is negative.

intents.description: Provider wants to message a customer.
responses: You can message the customer directly from the booking details page. Use the chat feature for quick communication.
Please keep all communication within the app for your safety and record-keeping.
You can discuss job details, arrival time, or any special instructions via the in-app chat.

intents.description: Provider wants to call a customer (anonymized).
responses: For privacy, we provide a masked calling feature. You can request a call from the booking page, and we'll connect you without revealing numbers.
To protect both parties, we recommend using the in-app chat. If you need to speak, use the 'Call' option in the app to get a temporary number.
Once the booking is confirmed, you can request a call with the customer through the app.

intents.description: Provider wants to report a customer for inappropriate behavior.
responses: We're sorry you're experiencing this. You can report a customer from the booking page by selecting 'Report'. Our safety team will investigate.
Please provide details of the incident. If you feel unsafe, you can cancel the booking and leave immediately.
Customer safety is important for everyone. Reports are taken seriously and may lead to account suspension.

intents.description: Provider wants to block a customer from future bookings.
text: don't want to work with them again
responses: You can block a customer from your provider dashboard after a booking is completed. Go to the booking and select 'Block Customer'.
Blocking a customer means they won't be able to book you again. This is useful after a negative experience.
You can manage your blocked list in 'Provider Settings'. You can unblock them anytime.

intents.description: Provider wants to mark a customer as favorite.
responses: You can mark customers as favorites! They'll get a badge and you'll be notified when they post a new job.
Favoriting a customer helps build long-term relationships. They'll appreciate the recognition.
Go to the booking and tap 'Add to Favorites'. You can view your favorite customers in your dashboard.

intents.description: Provider sets their availability for today.
responses: You can set your availability for today in the provider dashboard. Toggle 'Available Now' to appear in instant booking searches.
If you're ready to work, mark yourself as available. Customers looking for immediate service will see you.
Your availability status helps customers know when you can take jobs. Update it as your schedule changes.

intents.description: Provider enables instant booking (no need for customer approval).
responses: You can enable 'Instant Booking' in your service settings. This allows customers to book you immediately without waiting for your acceptance.
Instant booking can increase your bookings. Make sure your calendar is always up to date.
To enable, go to 'Provider Dashboard' > 'Settings' > 'Booking Preferences' and toggle Instant Booking on.

intents.description: Provider wants to set reminders for upcoming jobs.
responses: You can manage notification preferences in 'Provider Settings' > 'Notifications'. Choose to get reminders for upcoming jobs.
We'll send you push notifications before your scheduled bookings to help you prepare.
You can set reminders 1 hour, 2 hours, or 1 day before the job start time.

intents.description: Provider wants to see performance stats.
responses: Your provider analytics are available in the dashboard. You can see your booking acceptance rate, average rating, and earnings over time.
Tracking your stats helps you understand your business better. Aim for high acceptance and low cancellation rates.
Analytics include metrics like response time, customer satisfaction, and repeat booking rate.

intents.description: Provider needs help from provider support.
responses: For provider-specific issues, you can contact our dedicated provider support team via email at providers@smartserve.ai or through the 'Help' section in your dashboard.
Provider support is available Monday-Friday, 9am-6pm. For urgent matters, use the in-app chat.
You can also browse the Provider FAQ in the help center for quick answers.

intents.description: Provider asks about training resources.
responses: We offer free training resources for providers! Check out the 'Learning Center' in your dashboard for videos and articles on customer service, safety, and marketing.
Improving your skills can lead to better reviews and more bookings. Visit our blog for tips from top-rated pros.
We occasionally host webinars on topics like pricing strategies and using the app effectively. Keep an eye on your notifications.

intents.description: Provider asks about community forums or groups.
responses: Join our private Facebook group for SmartServe providers! Connect with other pros, share tips, and get updates. Search 'SmartServe Pros Community' on Facebook.
We have a community forum in the app where you can ask questions and share experiences. Access it from the provider dashboard.
Networking with other providers can help you grow. Look for local meetups announced in the community.

intents.description: Provider wants to subscribe to a newsletter.
responses: You can subscribe to our provider newsletter in your account settings. We'll send tips, updates, and exclusive offers.
The newsletter comes out monthly. You can unsubscribe anytime.
To subscribe, go to 'Provider Settings' > 'Communications' and check the box for 'Newsletter'.

intents.description: Provider asks about terms of service for pros.
responses: You can review the Provider Terms of Service in the app under 'Legal' or on our website. It covers your rights and responsibilities.
The provider agreement includes information on commissions, payments, and code of conduct. Please read it carefully.
If you have questions about the terms, contact provider support for clarification.

intents.description: Provider wants to delete their pro account.
responses: We're sorry to see you go. You can delete your provider account from 'Provider Settings' > 'Account' > 'Delete Account'. This will remove all your data and listings.
Before deleting, please settle any pending payments. Once deleted, this action cannot be undone.
If you're facing issues, maybe we can help? Contact support before deleting.

intents.description: Provider wants to switch to customer mode.
responses: You can easily switch between provider and customer modes in the app. Tap your profile icon and select 'Switch to Customer'.
In customer mode, you can book services for yourself. Your provider profile remains active.
To switch back, just select 'Switch to Provider' from the profile menu.

intents.description: Customer wants to become a provider.
responses: Great! You can sign up as a provider from the same account. Go to 'My Account' and select 'Become a Provider'. Follow the steps to get verified.
Once you register as a provider, you can list your services and start earning. Your customer profile remains separate.
Check out the provider section for more details on requirements and benefits.

intents.description: Customer wants to refer a friend.
responses: You can refer friends from the 'Refer & Earn' section. Share your code, and when they book, you both get credits!
Your referral link is in your profile. Share it via WhatsApp, email, or social media.
Referral bonuses are applied automatically when your friend completes their first booking.

intents.description: Customer wants to check referral status.
responses: You can track your referrals in the 'Refer & Earn' section. It shows how many friends signed up and your earned credits.
Referral earnings are added to your wallet once the friend completes a booking.
Check the status there to see pending and confirmed referrals.

intents.description: User checks their wallet balance.
responses: Your current wallet balance is displayed in the 'Wallet' section under 'My Account'. You can use it for future bookings.
Wallet balance includes referral credits, refunds, and top-ups. Check the transaction history for details.
You have [balance] available. Would you like to add more funds?

intents.description: User wants to add money to wallet.
responses: You can add funds to your wallet from the 'Wallet' page. Choose an amount and pay via your preferred method.
Wallet recharges are instant. You can use the balance for any service booking.
Minimum recharge is $5. Maximum is $500 per transaction.

intents.description: User wants to see wallet transaction history.
responses: Your wallet transaction history is available in the 'Wallet' section. You can see credits, debits, and dates.
Filter by date or type (recharge, referral, refund, payment) to find specific transactions.
For a detailed statement, you can download a PDF from the wallet page.

intents.description: User asks about gift cards.
responses: You can purchase gift cards for friends and family! Go to 'Gift Cards' in the app, choose an amount, and send via email or SMS.
To redeem a gift card, enter the code at checkout or in the 'Wallet' section.
Gift cards never expire and can be used for any service.

intents.description: User asks about premium membership.
responses: Our SmartServe+ membership gives you discounts on every booking, priority support, and exclusive offers. Check the 'Membership' section for details.
For just $9.99/month, you save 10% on all services and get free rescheduling. Cancel anytime.
Membership pays for itself if you book regularly. See the benefits and sign up in the app.

intents.description: User wants to set up recurring bookings (e.g., weekly cleaning).
responses: You can set up recurring bookings! After booking a service, select 'Make it Recurring' and choose your frequency (weekly, bi-weekly, monthly).
Recurring services ensure you never miss a scheduled task. You can pause or cancel anytime.
To manage recurring bookings, go to 'My Bookings' and select the 'Recurring' tab.

intents.description: User wants to pause a recurring service.
responses: You can pause a recurring booking from the 'Recurring' section. Select the booking and tap 'Pause'. You can resume later.
Pausing means you won't be charged for upcoming sessions until you resume.
To skip just one occurrence, you can reschedule that specific visit instead of pausing the whole series.

intents.description: User wants to cancel a recurring service.
responses: You can cancel a recurring booking anytime. Go to 'Recurring' bookings, select the one you want to cancel, and tap 'Cancel Series'.
Cancelling will stop all future bookings. Any prepaid sessions will be refunded according to policy.
Are you sure? You can also pause instead of cancelling.

intents.description: User asks to be reminded about upcoming service.
responses: You'll automatically receive reminders via push notification and email before your scheduled service.
You can customize reminder timing in 'Notification Settings' under 'My Account'.
Reminders are sent 24 hours and 1 hour before the appointment.

intents.description: User asks if there's a fee for rescheduling.
responses: Rescheduling is free if done at least 24 hours before the appointment. Late changes may incur a small fee.
Check the 'Cancellation & Reschedule Policy' for your specific booking. Fees vary by service type.
You can see any applicable fees before confirming a reschedule.

intents.description: User asks about cancellation charges.
responses: Cancellation fees depend on how close to the appointment you cancel. Within 24 hours may incur a charge.
You can see the exact cancellation policy for your booking in the booking details.
For most services, free cancellation is available up to 24 hours before the start time.

intents.description: User wants to search for a specific provider.
responses: You can search for providers by name or service using the search bar on the home screen.
If you know the provider's name, type it in the search box. You can also filter by rating and distance.
Search results show matching providers. You can view their profile and reviews before booking.

intents.description: User wants to filter providers by criteria.
responses: When viewing search results, use the 'Filter' button to narrow down by rating, price range, availability, and more.
You can sort providers by distance, rating, or price to find the best match.
Filters help you quickly find the right professional for your needs.

intents.description: User wants to compare two or more providers.
responses: You can compare providers by selecting them and tapping 'Compare'. This shows their ratings, prices, and reviews side by side.
Comparison helps you make an informed decision. Look at their experience and customer feedback.
Not all providers may have the comparison feature enabled, but you can always view their profiles individually.

intents.description: User asks for recommended provider.
responses: Based on your location, I can show you top-rated providers. Just select the service category and sort by rating.
We recommend checking reviews and choosing a provider with high ratings and good feedback.
For [service], some highly rated providers near you are [list a few]. Would you like to book one?

intents.description: User wants to save a provider as favorite.
responses: You can save providers to your favorites by tapping the heart icon on their profile. Find them later in 'My Favorites'.
Favoriting a provider makes it easy to rebook them. You'll also get notified when they have special offers.
To view your favorite providers, go to 'My Account' > 'Favorites'.

intents.description: User wants to remove a provider from favorites.
responses: You can remove a provider from your favorites by going to 'My Favorites' and tapping the remove icon.
If you no longer want to follow this provider, simply unfavorite them. You can always add them back later.

intents.description: User wants to share a provider's profile with someone.
responses: You can share a provider's profile by tapping the 'Share' button on their page. Choose your preferred app (WhatsApp, email, etc.).
Sharing helps others find great pros. The link will open the app or direct to the website.
Go to the provider's profile and tap the share icon. Your friend will see the provider's info and reviews.

intents.description: User wants to check if a provider is available on a certain date.
responses: You can check a provider's availability on their profile. Select the service and date to see open slots.
Provider calendars show their working hours and booked times. Choose a time that works for you.
If you have a specific date in mind, try booking and you'll see if they're available.

intents.description: User wants to add special instructions to a booking.
responses: You can add special instructions when booking. There's a 'Add Notes' field where you can describe your requirements.
Let the provider know any important details (gate code, parking, specific tasks) to ensure a smooth service.
Notes are shared with the provider immediately. You can also update them later from the booking page.

intents.description: User wants to edit booking details (not time/date).
responses: You can edit the description or add photos to an existing booking from the booking details page, as long as it's not yet accepted.
If the provider has already accepted, you may need to contact them directly via chat to discuss changes.
For major changes, consider cancelling and rebooking with the correct details.

intents.description: User wants to upload photos of the problem.
responses: You can attach photos when creating a request or later from the booking page. Photos help providers understand the job better.
Clear photos can lead to more accurate quotes. You can upload up to 5 images per booking.
To add photos, go to the booking and tap 'Add Photos'.

intents.description: User asks about satisfaction guarantee.
text: what if i don't like the work
responses: We offer a satisfaction guarantee! If you're not happy with the service, you can request a redo or refund within 24 hours.
Our guarantee ensures quality. If issues arise, we'll work with you and the provider to resolve them.
Check our 'Service Guarantee' policy in the help center for details.

intents.description: User wants to report damage caused by provider.
responses: We're sorry to hear that. Please report the damage immediately from the booking page under 'Report an Issue'. Include photos.
Our insurance team will investigate. Most claims are resolved within 5-7 business days.
For urgent damage, contact our support hotline directly.

intents.description: User wants to check refund status.
responses: You can check refund status in your wallet transaction history. Refunds typically take 5-10 business days to reflect in your account.
If you requested a refund recently, it may still be processing. Contact support if it's been more than 10 days.
Refund status is also shown in the booking details under 'Payments'.

intents.description: User reports promo code issue.
responses: Please check the code for typos and ensure it hasn't expired. Some codes have minimum spend requirements.
If you're sure the code is correct, try applying it at checkout again. If it still fails, contact support with the code.
Promo codes may not be combinable with other offers. Check the terms of the code.

intents.description: User reports payment failure.
responses: Payment failures can happen due to insufficient funds or network issues. Please try again or use a different payment method.
If the amount was deducted but booking not confirmed, it will be refunded automatically within 24 hours.
Contact your bank if the issue persists. You can also try paying with wallet balance.

intents.description: User accidentally booked twice.
responses: No problem! You can cancel one of the duplicate bookings. Cancellation will be free if done within the policy window.
If both are confirmed, contact support to cancel one without penalty.
Please cancel the extra booking from 'My Bookings' to avoid being charged twice.

intents.description: User can't see their booking.
responses: Sometimes bookings take a moment to appear. Please refresh the page. If still missing, check your email for confirmation.
If you just booked, it may be processing. Wait a few minutes and check again.
If you still can't find it, contact support with the email used for booking.

intents.description: App crashed during booking process.
responses: We're sorry for the trouble. Please restart the app and check if the booking went through in 'My Bookings'.
If the payment was deducted but booking not confirmed, it will be auto-refunded within 24 hours.
Try again after restarting. If the issue persists, update the app or contact support.

intents.description: User wants to manage notifications.
responses: You can manage notification preferences in 'My Account' > 'Settings' > 'Notifications'. Choose what you want to receive.
Turn off marketing emails, but we recommend keeping booking reminders on.
Changes take effect immediately. You can always come back to adjust them.

intents.description: User wants to unsubscribe from emails.
responses: You can unsubscribe from marketing emails by clicking the 'Unsubscribe' link at the bottom of any email.
To manage all communications, go to 'Notification Settings' in the app and toggle off 'Promotional Emails'.
You'll still receive essential service-related emails (booking confirmations, receipts).

intents.description: User asks about dark mode.
responses: Yes! Our app supports dark mode. You can enable it in 'Settings' under 'Appearance' or follow your device settings.
Dark mode is easier on the eyes at night. Switch anytime from the profile menu.
To turn on dark mode, go to 'My Account' > 'Settings' > 'Theme' and select Dark.

intents.description: User wants to change font size.
responses: You can adjust font size in your device's accessibility settings. The app will respect your system font size.
For larger text, go to your phone's Settings > Display > Font Size. Our app adjusts automatically.
If you need further assistance with readability, let us know.

intents.description: User asks about VoiceOver/TalkBack support.
responses: Our app is fully compatible with screen readers like VoiceOver (iOS) and TalkBack (Android). All buttons and content are properly labeled.
If you encounter any accessibility issues, please report them so we can improve.
You can navigate the app using gestures and screen reader. Let us know if you need help with a specific feature.

intents.description: User asks if app works offline.
responses: The app requires an internet connection for most features. However, you can view previously loaded pages if you have a weak connection.
For booking, you need to be online. We recommend using Wi-Fi or mobile data.
Offline mode is not supported, but the app is optimized to work on slower connections.

intents.description: User asks about app data consumption.
responses: The app is designed to be data-efficient. Typical usage is around 1-2 MB per session. Image loading may use more.
You can enable 'Data Saver' mode in settings to reduce image quality and save data.
Data saver mode is recommended if you have a limited plan.

intents.description: User asks why app needs certain permissions.
responses: We need location to show providers near you and for address auto-fill. Camera is for uploading photos of the job.
Permissions are only used for the stated purposes and are never shared without your consent.
You can manage permissions in your device settings. Some features may not work if denied.

intents.description: User suspects account compromise.
responses: Please change your password immediately. Go to 'Settings' > 'Change Password'. Also enable two-factor authentication.
If you see unrecognized bookings, contact support right away to secure your account.
We'll help you investigate. Please provide details of any suspicious activity.

intents.description: User asks about two-factor authentication.
responses: You can enable 2FA in 'Security Settings'. We'll send a code to your phone each time you log in from a new device.
Two-factor adds an extra layer of security to your account. Highly recommended.
To set up, go to 'My Account' > 'Settings' > 'Security' and toggle on 2FA.

intents.description: User wants to change password.
responses: You can change your password in 'My Account' > 'Settings' > 'Change Password'. You'll need your current password.
Choose a strong password you haven't used elsewhere. Avoid common words.
Password changed successfully! Remember to update it on any saved devices.

intents.description: User wants to link Google/Facebook.
responses: You can link your Google or Facebook account in 'Settings' > 'Linked Accounts'. This makes login easier.
Linking accounts allows you to sign in quickly. We never post anything without permission.
To unlink, go to the same section and disconnect.

intents.description: User wants to log out.
responses: You can log out from 'My Account' > 'Settings' > 'Log Out'. You'll be returned to the login screen.
Logged out successfully. See you next time!
Are you sure you want to log out? You can always log back in.

intents.description: User's session expired.
responses: Your session may have expired for security. Please log in again.
If you were in the middle of something, don't worry. Your cart is saved.
Login again to continue.

intents.description: User wants to see devices logged in.
responses: You can see all devices where your account is active in 'Security Settings' > 'Devices'. You can log out remotely from any device.
If you see an unfamiliar device, log it out immediately and change your password.
Device management helps you keep your account secure.

intents.description: User complains service wasn't as described.
text: provider didn't do what we agreed
responses: I'm sorry to hear that. Please report this issue from the booking page. Include details of what was missed.
You can request a partial refund or a redo. Our team will mediate.
Clear communication is key. Please let the provider know via chat as well.

intents.description: Provider didn't show up.
responses: We apologize for the inconvenience. Please mark the booking as 'Provider No-Show' in the app. You will not be charged.
We'll investigate and take appropriate action. You can book another provider immediately.
We're sorry you had this experience. Would you like help finding a replacement?

intents.description: Provider is late.
responses: You can message the provider through the chat to ask for an ETA. Sometimes traffic causes delays.
If they are more than 15 minutes late without notice, you can report it.
We'll check on the provider for you. Please give them a few more minutes.

intents.description: Provider was rude or unprofessional.
responses: We take professionalism seriously. Please report the incident from the booking page. Our team will review.
Your comfort is important. If you feel unsafe, you can ask the provider to leave and contact support.
Thank you for letting us know. We'll address this with the provider.

intents.description: Provider left work unfinished.
responses: Please contact the provider via chat to discuss completing the work. If they refuse, report it for resolution.
We can help mediate. Please provide details of what's unfinished.
You may be eligible for a partial refund if the work is incomplete.

intents.description: User unhappy with quality.
responses: We're sorry the quality didn't meet expectations. Please share feedback with the provider first, and if unresolved, raise a complaint.
Photos can help us assess the issue. You can upload them in the chat or complaint form.
Our satisfaction guarantee may apply. Let us know how we can help.

intents.description: User believes they were overcharged.
responses: Please check the final invoice. If it doesn't match the agreed price, you can dispute it from the booking page.
Contact the provider first to clarify. If unresolved, our support team can step in.
Overcharging is against our policy. We'll investigate and adjust if necessary.

intents.description: User sees unexpected fees.
responses: All charges should be disclosed before booking. If you see unexpected fees, please report them.
Sometimes travel fees or material costs are added. Check with the provider for breakdown.
We'll review the charges and ensure they are justified.

intents.description: User reports wrong amount charged.
responses: If you were charged the wrong amount, please contact support with the booking details. We'll correct it.
Double charges are rare but can happen. We'll refund the extra amount promptly.
Please check your bank statement and share the transaction ID with us.

intents.description: Payment deducted but booking not confirmed.
responses: Sometimes there's a delay. Please wait 10 minutes and check again. If still not confirmed, it will auto-refund.
Contact support with the transaction details. We'll ensure you're not charged without a booking.
This is usually a temporary glitch. We'll resolve it quickly.

intents.description: User hasn't received refund.
responses: Refunds can take 5-10 business days to appear, depending on your bank. If it's been longer, contact support.
Check your wallet or original payment method. If still missing, provide the booking ID.
We'll trace the refund and update you.

intents.description: User complains support isn't replying.
responses: We apologize for the delay. Support volumes can be high. Please provide your ticket number, and I'll escalate.
You can try our live chat for faster assistance during business hours.
We'll prioritize your request. Thank you for your patience.

intents.description: User wants to escalate complaint to manager.
responses: I understand you want to escalate. Please provide your complaint details, and I'll ensure it reaches a senior team member.
You can request a callback from a manager via the 'Help' section.
We take complaints seriously. A supervisor will review your case within 24 hours.

intents.description: User threatens legal action.
responses: We're sorry you feel this way. Please allow our support team to resolve the issue amicably. Legal action is a last resort.
If you wish to pursue legal channels, please contact our legal department at legal@smartserve.ai.
We hope to resolve this without legal involvement. Let us know how we can make it right.

intents.description: User wants to contact CEO.
responses: You can write to our CEO at ceo@smartserve.ai. Please be assured that customer concerns are taken seriously at all levels.
For executive attention, please email ceo@smartserve.ai with your issue.
While I can't connect you directly, I can ensure your feedback reaches leadership.

intents.description: Journalist making inquiry.
responses: For media inquiries, please contact our PR team at press@smartserve.ai. They'll respond promptly.
Visit our Press page for media kits and contact information.
Thank you for your interest. Please email press@smartserve.ai.

intents.description: Investor inquiry.
responses: For investor inquiries, please email investors@smartserve.ai. We'll share relevant information.
Check our investor relations page on the website for updates.
Thank you for your interest in SmartServe.

intents.description: Business partnership proposal.
responses: We're open to partnerships! Please email partnerships@smartserve.ai with your proposal.
Tell us more about your company and how you'd like to collaborate.
Our partnerships team will review and get back to you.

intents.description: Student working on project.
responses: We love supporting education! Please send your project details to education@smartserve.ai.
For student inquiries, please use the education contact form on our website.
We'll try to help if possible, but cannot guarantee participation in all projects.

intents.description: Request to participate in survey.
responses: We occasionally participate in research. Please email research@smartserve.ai with your proposal.
If it's a customer satisfaction survey, you might find it in the app occasionally.
We'll consider your request and get back to you.

intents.description: User wants to become beta tester.
responses: We'd love to have you! Sign up for our beta program via the app store (iOS TestFlight or Google Play Beta).
Beta testers get early access to new features. You can provide feedback directly.
Check the 'Beta' section in the app or visit our website to join.

intents.description: User suggests new feature.
responses: We love hearing ideas! Please share your feature request in the app under 'Feedback' or email ideas@smartserve.ai.
Tell us more about what you'd like to see. We'll pass it to the product team.
Your input helps shape our roadmap. Thank you!

intents.description: User reports a bug.
responses: Please describe the bug and provide screenshots if possible. Report via 'Help' > 'Report a Bug'.
We'll investigate and fix it. Thank you for helping us improve.
Bug reports are important to us. Please include your device model and app version.

intents.description: App is slow or laggy.
responses: We're sorry for the slow performance. Try closing other apps and restarting. Also check your internet connection.
If the issue persists, please report it with your device details.
We're constantly optimizing. A update may be available soon.

intents.description: User has connectivity problem.
responses: It seems you might be offline. Please check your Wi-Fi or mobile data and try again.
Some features require an internet connection. Once you're back online, you can continue.
If you're connected but still having issues, try restarting the app.

intents.description: User asks about location permission.
responses: Location helps us show providers near you and auto-fill your address. You can enable it in device settings.
Without location, you may need to manually enter your address each time.
You can grant location only while using the app for privacy.

intents.description: User asks about camera permission.
responses: Camera access allows you to take photos of the job or upload profile pictures. You can enable it in settings.
Photos help providers understand the task better. You can also upload from gallery without camera.
We never access your camera without your action.

intents.description: User asks about notification permission.
responses: Notifications keep you updated on booking status, messages, and offers. Enable them in device settings.
You can customize which notifications you receive in the app settings.
Without notifications, you might miss important updates.

intents.description: User asks about contacts permission.
responses: Contacts permission is optional and used only for referring friends. We never access your contacts without permission.
You can refer friends without granting contact access by manually entering their info.
If you previously denied, you can enable it in device settings.

intents.description: User asks about storage permission.
responses: Storage permission allows you to upload photos from your gallery and save images from the app.
You can still take photos with camera without storage if you grant camera only.
We need storage to attach existing photos to bookings.

intents.description: User asks about microphone permission.
responses: Microphone is used for voice messages in chat and for future voice features. You can enable it when needed.
We don't listen without your action. You can deny and still use text chat.
Voice messages are optional.

intents.description: User asks why app needs background location.
responses: Background location is only used for provider tracking during an active booking, so you can see their arrival in real-time.
We do not track you otherwise. You can disable background location, but live tracking won't work.
For privacy, you can set location to 'While Using' instead of 'Always'.

intents.description: User requests data deletion under GDPR.
responses: You can request data deletion from 'Settings' > 'Privacy' > 'Delete My Data'. This will erase your personal information.
Note that some data may be retained for legal reasons (e.g., transaction records).
For GDPR requests, you can also email privacy@smartserve.ai.

intents.description: User wants to download their data.
responses: You can request a data export from 'Settings' > 'Privacy' > 'Download My Data'. We'll prepare a file within 30 days.
You'll receive an email with a link to download your data in JSON format.
This includes your profile, bookings, and messages.

intents.description: User reports a terms violation by another user.
responses: Please report the user from their profile or the booking page. Our team will review and take action.
Provide details of the violation. We maintain a safe community.
Thank you for helping us keep the platform safe.

intents.description: User suspects a fake provider profile.
responses: If you suspect a fake profile, please report it immediately. We verify all providers, but sometimes fake ones slip through.
Do not share personal information outside the app. We'll investigate.
Thank you for vigilance. Report via the profile's 'Report' button.

intents.description: User receives spam in chat.
responses: Please report the message by tapping and holding it, then select 'Report'. We'll block the sender.
Do not click on any links from suspicious messages. Our team will take action.
Spam is not tolerated. Thank you for reporting.

intents.description: User sees inappropriate content.
responses: Please report the content immediately. Our safety team will remove it and take appropriate action.
We strive to maintain a respectful environment. Thank you for helping.
If it's in a profile or review, use the report option.

intents.description: User has child safety concern.
responses: If you have an immediate safety concern, please contact local authorities. Then report to us so we can investigate.
We take child safety very seriously. Please email safety@smartserve.ai with details.
Our platform is not for minors to book services. If a minor is using the app, please report it.

intents.description: User asks about SOS feature.
responses: During a service, you can use the in-app SOS button to alert our security team and share your location with emergency contacts.
Set up emergency contacts in 'Safety Settings' before booking.
If you're in danger, call local emergency services immediately, then use SOS.

intents.description: User asks about COVID-19 precautions.
responses: We encourage all providers to follow local health guidelines. You can request that your provider wear a mask in the booking notes.
Some providers are vaccinated. Check their profile for badges.
For your safety, we recommend maintaining distance and sanitizing after service.

intents.description: User asks if provider is vaccinated.
responses: Some providers have voluntarily shared their vaccination status. Look for the 'Vaccinated' badge on their profile.
If it's important to you, you can message the provider before booking to ask.
We don't require vaccination disclosure, but many providers choose to share.

intents.description: User asks about mask requirements.
responses: Masks are not mandatory platform-wide, but you can request your provider to wear one in the booking notes.
Many providers are happy to comply with your safety requests. Please communicate your needs.
If a provider refuses, you can cancel without penalty (within policy).

intents.description: User asks about cleaning protocols.
responses: Providers are expected to follow basic hygiene. For services like cleaning, they use appropriate products.
You can ask about specific sanitization measures before booking.
We recommend discussing any concerns with the provider directly.

intents.description: User wants contactless service.
responses: Some services can be done contactless (e.g., online tutoring, remote tech support). Specify your preference in the booking notes.
For in-person services, you can request minimal contact and digital payment.
Contactless options depend on the provider. Check their profile or message them.

intents.description: User wants virtual/online service.
responses: Many providers offer virtual services! Look for the 'Online' tag or filter by 'Virtual' when searching.
Virtual services include tutoring, consulting, tech support, and more. You'll receive a link to connect.
You can book online services just like in-person ones.

intents.description: User needs remote tech support.
responses: You can find remote tech support under 'PC Installation' or 'Tutor' categories. Filter for 'Virtual' services.
The provider will guide you through steps or use remote desktop software.
Ensure you're comfortable with the provider before granting remote access.

intents.description: User wants video call with provider.
responses: If you booked a virtual service, the provider will usually send a video call link (Zoom, Google Meet, etc.) before the session.
For in-person services, video calls aren't typical, but you can request a quick video consultation via chat.
Never share personal video call links publicly.

intents.description: User wants audio call.
responses: You can request an audio call through the app's masked calling feature to protect privacy.
Use the 'Call' button on the booking page to connect without sharing numbers.
For virtual services, the provider may use a separate app for audio.

intents.description: User asks about chat feature.
responses: You can chat with your provider directly from the booking page. All communication is within the app for safety.
Use chat to discuss details, ask questions, or share photos.
Chat history is saved for reference.

intents.description: User wants to upload files.
responses: In chat, you can tap the attachment icon to upload images or documents. Supported formats: JPG, PNG, PDF.
File size limit is 10MB. For larger files, use a cloud link.
Upload clear photos to help the provider understand the job.

intents.description: User wants to send voice message.
responses: In chat, you can record and send voice messages by tapping the microphone icon. This is great for explaining things quickly.
Voice messages are stored in the chat. You can listen anytime.
Make sure your microphone permission is enabled.

intents.description: User wants to set emergency contacts.
responses: You can add emergency contacts in 'Safety Settings'. These people will be alerted if you use the SOS button.
Choose up to 3 contacts. They'll receive an SMS with your location in an emergency.
Keep your emergency contacts updated.

intents.description: User wants to add a trusted contact.
responses: Go to 'Safety Settings' to add trusted contacts. They'll be notified during an emergency.
You can also share your live location with them during a booking for peace of mind.
Trusted contacts are optional but recommended.

intents.description: User wants to view past services.
responses: All your past bookings are in 'My Bookings' under the 'Completed' tab. You can view details and rebook.
Service history helps you track what you've had done and when.
You can also see invoices for past services there.

intents.description: User wants to see future bookings.
responses: Your upcoming bookings are listed in 'My Bookings' under 'Upcoming'. You can view details, reschedule, or cancel.
Check your upcoming appointments to ensure you're available.
You'll receive reminders before each upcoming booking.

intents.description: User wants to see completed bookings.
responses: Go to 'My Bookings' and select the 'Completed' tab to see all past services. You can rebook from there.
Past bookings include details like provider, date, and amount paid.
You can also leave reviews for past bookings if you haven't already.

intents.description: User wants specific booking info.
responses: You can view full details of any booking by tapping on it in 'My Bookings'. This includes provider info, address, time, and payment.
If you need to contact the provider, use the chat from the booking details page.
Booking details also show cancellation policy and invoice.

intents.description: User wants provider profile info.
responses: You can view a provider's profile by tapping on their name in the booking or search results. See their rating, reviews, and services.
Provider profiles show verification badges, years of experience, and bio.
Check their reviews to see what other customers say.

intents.description: Provider wants customer details.
responses: In the booking, you can see the customer's name, address, and contact options. You can also message them.
Customer details are provided for the service only. Please respect their privacy.
Use the chat to communicate. Don't share customer information outside the app.

intents.description: User wants all invoices.
responses: You can find all your invoices in the 'Wallet' section under 'Invoices' or in each booking details.
Download invoices for tax purposes or record-keeping.
Invoices are generated for every completed booking.

intents.description: User wants payment history.
responses: Your payment history is in the 'Wallet' section. It shows all credits and debits.
You can filter by date or type (booking payment, refund, wallet recharge).
Each transaction links to the related booking.

intents.description: User wants points history.
responses: You can see your points earned and redeemed in the 'Rewards' section. It shows a log of each points transaction.
Points are earned on bookings and can be redeemed for discounts.
Check your points balance and history there.

intents.description: User wants referral history.
responses: In the 'Refer & Earn' section, you can see a list of people you've referred and their status (pending, completed).
You'll see how much you've earned from each successful referral.
Referral history helps you track your rewards.

intents.description: User wants past notifications.
responses: You can view your past notifications in the app by tapping the bell icon. It shows recent alerts.
Notification history includes booking updates, offers, and reminders.
You can clear notifications or tap to go to the related item.

intents.description: User wants to search for a service.
responses: Use the search bar on the home screen to type what you need (e.g., 'plumber', 'massage'). We'll show relevant providers.
You can also browse categories and then filter results.
Try searching with keywords for best results.

intents.description: User wants providers near them.
responses: On the home screen, you'll see a list of nearby providers based on your location. You can also search and sort by distance.
Make sure location services are enabled to see accurate nearby results.
Nearby providers can often arrive faster and may have lower travel fees.

intents.description: User wants providers currently online.
responses: You can filter providers by 'Online Now' or 'Available Today' to find those ready to take immediate bookings.
Providers marked 'Online' are active and can respond quickly.
Check the 'Instant Booking' eligible providers for immediate service.

intents.description: User wants instant booking option.
responses: Look for the 'Instant Booking' badge on provider profiles. These providers accept jobs without prior approval, so you can book instantly.
Instant booking is great for urgent needs. Just select a time and confirm.
You can filter search results to show only instant booking providers.

intents.description: User wants to book for future date.
responses: When booking, you can select any available date and time from the provider's calendar. Choose a future date that works for you.
Providers show their availability up to 30 days in advance.
You can schedule recurring services for future dates as well.

intents.description: User wants to rebook a past provider.
responses: In your past bookings, you can tap 'Rebook' to hire the same provider again. It will use the same service details (you can modify).
Rebooking is convenient if you were happy with their work.
The provider will be notified of your new booking request.

intents.description: User wants to save provider to favorites.
responses: On the provider's profile, tap the heart icon to add them to your favorites. You can find them later in 'My Favorites'.
Saving a provider makes it easy to rebook them.
You'll also get notifications if they have special offers.

intents.description: User wants to remove provider from favorites.
responses: Go to 'My Favorites', find the provider, and tap the remove icon (or heart again) to unfavorite them.
You can always add them back later if you change your mind.

intents.description: User wants to share the app.
responses: You can share the app via the 'Share App' option in the drawer. Choose any platform to send the download link.
Sharing helps us grow. Thank you!
Your friend will get a download link. If they sign up, you might earn referral credits!

intents.description: User wants to rate the app in store.
responses: We'd love your feedback! You can rate us on the App Store or Google Play. Go to 'Settings' > 'Rate Us' for a direct link.
Your rating helps others discover SmartServe. Thank you!
If you have suggestions, please also share them via feedback.

intents.description: User wants to write a review for the app.
responses: You can write a review on the App Store or Google Play. We appreciate your honest feedback!
Go to the store page and leave a review. It helps us improve.
Thank you for taking the time to review us!

intents.description: User wants to submit feedback via form.
responses: You can fill out our feedback form in the 'Help' section under 'Send Feedback'. We read every submission.
Your input helps shape future updates. Thank you!
Please be as detailed as possible so we can understand your perspective.

intents.description: User wants to contact support.
responses: You can contact support via the 'Help' section. Choose your issue and submit a ticket, or use live chat if available.
Our support team typically responds within 24 hours.
For urgent matters, please call our helpline.

intents.description: User wants to call support.
responses: Our support phone number is 1-800-555-0199. Available Monday-Friday, 9am-6pm local time.
For after-hours emergencies, use the in-app SOS or email.
Please have your booking ID ready when calling.

intents.description: User wants to email support.
responses: You can email us at support@smartserve.ai. Include your booking ID and details for faster assistance.
We aim to reply within 24-48 hours.
For account-related issues, use the registered email.

intents.description: User wants live chat.
responses: Live chat is available in the 'Help' section during business hours. Click 'Chat Now' to connect with an agent.
If no agent is available, you can leave a message and we'll get back to you.
Live chat is the fastest way to get help.

intents.description: User asks about WhatsApp support.
responses: You can reach us on WhatsApp at +1-800-555-0199. Save the number and send a message to start.
WhatsApp support is available for general inquiries. For urgent bookings, please use in-app chat.
Our WhatsApp hours are 9am-6pm Mon-Fri.

intents.description: User asks about Messenger support.
responses: You can message us on Facebook Messenger at m.me/smartserveapp. We'll respond as soon as possible.
Messenger is another way to get help. For account-specific issues, please use the app for security.
Our Messenger response time is typically within a few hours.

intents.description: User asks about Twitter support.
responses: You can tweet us @SmartServeHelp or send a DM. We monitor Twitter during business hours.
For privacy, please don't share personal information publicly. Use DM.
Twitter is best for quick questions and updates.

intents.description: User wants help center articles.
responses: Our Help Center has answers to common questions. You can access it from the app under 'Help' or on our website.
Search for topics like booking, payments, cancellations, and more.
The Help Center is available 24/7 for self-service.

intents.description: User wants to join community forum.
responses: Join our community forum at community.smartserve.ai to connect with other users, share tips, and ask questions.
The forum is moderated and a great place to learn from others.
You can also find announcements and feature discussions there.

intents.description: User wants to read blog.
responses: Check out our blog at blog.smartserve.ai for stories, tips, and company news.
We post regularly about new features, provider spotlights, and how-to guides.
Follow our blog to stay informed.

intents.description: User wants latest news.
responses: For the latest news, follow us on social media or check the 'News' section on our website.
We also send updates via email newsletter. You can subscribe in your profile settings.
Stay tuned for exciting announcements!

intents.description: User wants information about the company.
responses: SmartServe is a platform connecting customers with trusted local service professionals. Founded in 2020, we're on a mission to make hiring help easy and safe.
Learn more about our story, values, and team on our website's About page.
We're dedicated to providing quality service and peace of mind.

intents.description: User asks about company mission.
responses: Our mission is to empower communities by connecting people with reliable, skilled professionals, making everyday life simpler and safer.
We believe in trust, quality, and convenience.
Every booking supports local businesses and helps communities thrive.

intents.description: User asks about the team.
responses: Our team is made up of passionate individuals from diverse backgrounds, all dedicated to improving your service experience.
Meet some of our team members on the About page of our website.
We're a remote-first company with team members across the globe.

intents.description: User wants press kit.
responses: You can download our press kit, including logos and brand guidelines, from our website's Press page.
For media inquiries, please contact press@smartserve.ai.
Press kit includes high-res images and company fact sheet.

intents.description: User asks about security practices.
responses: We use industry-standard encryption to protect your data. All payments are PCI compliant.
Your personal information is stored securely and never shared without consent.
For more details, see our Security page.

intents.description: User asks for accessibility statement.
responses: Our accessibility statement outlines our commitment to making the app usable for everyone. You can find it on our website under Accessibility.
We are continuously improving to meet WCAG guidelines.
If you encounter any barriers, please let us know.

intents.description: User asks for sitemap.
responses: You can find the sitemap for our website at the bottom of the homepage. It lists all main pages.
For app navigation, the drawer menu provides access to all sections.
Let me know if you're looking for something specific.

intents.description: User asks about cookies.
responses: Our website uses cookies to improve your experience. You can read our Cookie Policy for details on how we use them.
You can manage cookie preferences in your browser settings.
We do not use cookies to track you across other sites.

intents.description: User asks about copyright.
responses: All content and trademarks are property of SmartServe Inc. Unauthorized use is prohibited.
Our copyright notice is at the bottom of our website.
For permissions, contact legal@smartserve.ai.

intents.description: User asks about legal disclaimer.
responses: Our disclaimer is part of the Terms of Service. It limits liability and clarifies that we are a platform, not a service provider.
Please read the full disclaimer on our website.
We recommend reviewing our terms before using the platform.

intents.description: User asks about open source licenses.
responses: We use various open source libraries. You can view the list of licenses in the app under 'Settings' > 'Open Source Licenses'.
We appreciate the contributions of the open source community.
The licenses are available for review.

intents.description: User asks about app version.
responses: You can find the app version in 'Settings' > 'About' or at the bottom of the drawer menu.
Current version is displayed there.
Check for updates in your app store.

intents.description: User asks if app works on their device.
responses: Our app supports iOS 13+ and Android 8+. It works on most modern smartphones and tablets.
For optimal experience, we recommend using the latest OS version.
If you're having issues, check that your device meets the minimum requirements.

intents.description: User asks about OS version.
responses: We require iOS 13 or later and Android 8 (Oreo) or later.
Older versions may not be fully supported.
Please update your device if possible for the best experience.

intents.description: User asks about tablet app.
responses: Our app works on tablets, but it's optimized for phones. You can still use all features on a tablet.
The interface scales to fit larger screens.
We're working on a dedicated tablet layout for future updates.

intents.description: User asks about smartwatch app.
responses: We currently don't have a dedicated watch app, but you may receive notifications on your watch if connected.
We're exploring wearable integration for future releases.
Stay tuned!

intents.description: User asks about Alexa/Google Home.
responses: We're working on integrating with voice assistants! You'll soon be able to book services via Alexa and Google Assistant.
Currently, you can use the app or website. Updates coming.
Follow our blog for announcements.

intents.description: Developer asks about API.
responses: We offer API access for approved partners. Please contact partnerships@smartserve.ai to inquire.
Our API allows you to integrate service booking into your platform.
We'll provide documentation upon partnership approval.

intents.description: Business asks about white label solution.
responses: We offer white-label solutions for businesses. Contact our enterprise team at enterprise@smartserve.ai.
You can have your own branded version of our platform.
Let's discuss your requirements.

intents.description: User asks about franchise opportunities.
responses: We're not a franchise, but we offer partnership opportunities. Please visit our website's 'Partner' section.
You can become a service provider or refer businesses.
For more information, email partnerships@smartserve.ai.

intents.description: User asks about investing in the company.
responses: We are currently privately held. For investment inquiries, please contact investors@smartserve.ai.
We'll share information if we open funding rounds.
Thank you for your interest.

intents.description: User wants to donate to charity via app.
responses: We support various charities. You can round up your booking total to donate the change. Enable this in 'Settings' > 'Donations'.
All donations go to our partner non-profits. Thank you for your generosity!
You can also donate directly on our website.

intents.description: User wants to volunteer with company.
responses: We organize volunteer events. Sign up for our newsletter or check the 'Community' section for updates.
You can also join our provider network to offer services to those in need.
Email volunteer@smartserve.ai for more info.

intents.description: User asks about environmental initiatives.
responses: We're committed to sustainability. We encourage providers to use eco-friendly products and offset carbon emissions.
Learn about our green practices on our website.
We partner with environmental organizations to reduce our footprint.

intents.description: User asks about diversity.
responses: We celebrate diversity and are committed to equal opportunity for all users and providers. Our platform is for everyone.
Read our diversity statement on our website.
We actively work to ensure an inclusive environment.

intents.description: User asks about awards won.
responses: We're proud to have been recognized as Best Service App 2023 and Innovation Award winner. See our Awards page for more.
These honors motivate us to keep improving.
Thank you to our users for making this possible!

intents.description: User wants to read testimonials.
responses: You can read customer testimonials on our website's Testimonials page. Real stories from happy users.
We love hearing how our platform has helped people.
Share your own story via feedback!

intents.description: User asks for case studies.
responses: We have case studies showcasing how businesses and individuals use SmartServe. Find them in our resource center.
Case studies highlight real-world applications and results.
Check them out for inspiration.

intents.description: User wants video tutorials.
responses: Visit our YouTube channel for video tutorials on using the app, booking services, and provider tips.
Search 'SmartServe Tutorials' on YouTube.
Videos cover common questions visually.

intents.description: User asks about webinars.
responses: We host webinars for providers and customers. Check the 'Events' section in the app or our website for schedules.
Webinars cover topics like safety, maximizing earnings, and new features.
Register for upcoming webinars for free.

intents.description: User asks about company events.
responses: We participate in industry events and host local meetups. See our Events page for details.
Join us at upcoming events to network and learn.
Follow us on social media for event announcements.

intents.description: User asks about local meetups.
responses: We occasionally organize local meetups for users and providers. Check the 'Community' section for announcements.
Meetups are a great way to connect with others in your area.
If you'd like to host one, contact community@smartserve.ai.

intents.description: User asks about conferences.
responses: We exhibit at major tech and service industry conferences. See our Events page for where we'll be next.
Stop by our booth to say hello and get swag!
Conference schedules are posted on our website.

intents.description: User asks about sponsorships.
responses: We consider sponsorship opportunities. Please email sponsorships@smartserve.ai with details.
We support events aligned with our mission.
Tell us about your event and audience.

intents.description: User asks about advertising on the platform.
responses: For advertising inquiries, please contact ads@smartserve.ai. We offer various ad placements.
Reach our engaged user base with targeted ads.
Our team will provide a media kit and options.

intents.description: Influencer asks about collaboration.
responses: We love working with influencers! Email influencers@smartserve.ai with your audience demographics and proposal.
We can explore affiliate partnerships or sponsored content.
Let's create something great together!

intents.description: User wants to sign up for affiliate program.
