responses: You can sign up for our affiliate program on our website under 'Affiliates'. Earn commissions for referring customers.
Once approved, you'll get a unique referral link and marketing materials.
Affiliate terms and commission rates are available on the signup page.

intents.description: Business wants to become a vendor/provider.
responses: Great! Download the app and sign up, then select 'Register as a Professional'. Follow the verification steps.
You'll need to provide ID, certifications, and business details.
Once verified, you can start offering services and earning.

intents.description: Provider asks about training.
responses: We offer free online training for providers. Access it from your provider dashboard under 'Training Center'.
Topics include customer service, safety, and business growth.
Complete training to earn badges and improve your profile.

intents.description: Provider asks about certification programs.
responses: We partner with industry bodies to offer certifications. Check the 'Certifications' section in your provider dashboard.
Certified providers get a special badge and higher visibility.
Certification may require passing an assessment.

intents.description: Provider wants to join provider community.
responses: Join our private provider community on Facebook or the in-app forum. Share tips, ask questions, and network.
Search 'SmartServe Pros' on Facebook to request access.
The community is a great support system.

intents.description: Provider wants provider-specific newsletter.
responses: You can subscribe to the provider newsletter in your dashboard under 'Communications'. Get updates on features, tips, and opportunities.
Newsletter comes monthly. Unsubscribe anytime.
Stay informed about platform changes and best practices.

intents.description: Provider asks about events for pros.
responses: We host virtual and in-person events for providers. Check the 'Events' tab in your provider dashboard.
Events include training webinars, Q&A sessions, and networking.
Participate to grow your business and connect.

intents.description: Provider asks about tools app.
responses: The provider app includes tools like calendar, earnings tracker, and customer management. All in your dashboard.
You can also access marketing tools to promote your services.
Explore the dashboard to see all available tools.

intents.description: Provider wants to access dashboard.
responses: You can access your provider dashboard by tapping the profile icon and selecting 'Provider Dashboard'.
From there, manage bookings, earnings, and settings.
The dashboard is your control center.

intents.description: Provider wants analytics.
responses: In your dashboard, go to 'Analytics' to see metrics like views, conversion rate, and earnings trends.
Use data to optimize your services and pricing.
Analytics are updated daily.

intents.description: Provider wants to see their ratings.
responses: Your overall rating is displayed on your profile. You can see detailed ratings in the 'Reviews' section of your dashboard.
Ratings are based on customer feedback after each booking.
Maintain high ratings by providing excellent service.

intents.description: Provider wants to read reviews.
responses: All your reviews are in the 'Reviews' section. You can read individual comments and respond.
Reviews help you improve and attract new customers.
Thank customers for positive feedback and address concerns professionally.

intents.description: Provider wants to reply to a review.
responses: In the 'Reviews' section, you can reply to each review. Be polite and constructive.
Replying shows you value customer input.
Your reply will be public.

intents.description: Provider wants to dispute a review.
responses: If you believe a review violates our guidelines, you can flag it for review. Go to the review and select 'Report'.
Our team will investigate and may remove it if inappropriate.
False reviews are taken seriously.

intents.description: Provider wants to manage portfolio.
responses: You can add photos of your work in the 'Portfolio' section of your dashboard. Showcase your best projects.
A strong portfolio attracts more customers.
You can organize photos by category.

intents.description: Provider asks about verification badge.
responses: Complete the verification process (ID, background check) to get a 'Verified' badge on your profile.
Verification builds trust with customers.
Check your verification status in the dashboard.

intents.description: Provider uploads insurance.
responses: You can upload your insurance certificate in the 'Documents' section. This adds an 'Insured' badge to your profile.
Insurance is required for some service categories.
Keep your insurance up to date.

intents.description: Provider uploads license.
responses: Upload your professional license in the 'Documents' section. This helps verify your expertise.
Licensed providers may appear higher in search results.
Ensure the license is current and clearly visible.

intents.description: Provider asks about background check status.
responses: Background checks typically take 2-3 business days. You'll be notified once complete.
You can check status in the 'Verification' section.
If it's been longer, contact support.

intents.description: Provider sets payout method.
responses: In 'Payout Settings', you can add your bank account or mobile money details. This is where your earnings will be sent.
You can have multiple payout methods and choose a default.
Ensure details are correct to avoid delays.

intents.description: Provider wants payout history.
responses: Your payout history is in the 'Earnings' section. It shows all withdrawals with dates and amounts.
You can download a statement for your records.
Check for any pending payouts.

intents.description: Provider requests withdrawal.
responses: Go to 'Earnings' and tap 'Withdraw'. Enter the amount (minimum $20) and confirm.
Withdrawals are processed within 2-3 business days.
You'll receive a notification once sent.

intents.description: Provider updates tax info.
responses: You can update your tax information in 'Settings' > 'Tax Info'. This is required for annual reporting.
Provide your tax ID or SSN for 1099 forms (US only).
Your information is kept confidential.

intents.description: Provider accepts a booking.
responses: Great! You've accepted the booking. The customer will be notified. You can now message them.
Remember to update your calendar and prepare for the job.
If you need to reschedule, contact the customer promptly.

intents.description: Provider declines a booking.
responses: No problem. The customer will be notified and can find another provider.
Your acceptance rate affects your search ranking. Try to accept when possible.
If you decline too often, your profile may be temporarily hidden.

intents.description: Provider wants to modify booking (time/date).
responses: You can suggest a new time to the customer via chat. If they agree, you can reschedule from the booking page.
Any changes must be approved by the customer.
Avoid last-minute changes to maintain good ratings.

intents.description: Provider marks arrived.
responses: Thank you! The customer has been notified of your arrival.
Tap 'Start Job' when you begin the work.
If you're early, you may need to wait until the scheduled time.

intents.description: Provider starts job.
responses: Job started! We've notified the customer. Good luck!
Remember to follow safety guidelines and communicate with the customer.
You can mark the job as complete when done.

intents.description: Provider completes job.
responses: Excellent! Please confirm with the customer that everything is satisfactory. Then request payment if needed.
The customer will be prompted to leave a review.
Thank you for your hard work!

intents.description: Provider sends invoice to customer.
responses: You can send a payment request from the booking page. The customer will receive a notification to pay.
Include any additional charges (materials, etc.) in the request.
Once paid, you'll receive confirmation.

intents.description: Provider marks cash payment collected.
responses: Great! Mark the booking as paid in the app. This updates your earnings.
If the customer paid online, it's automatic.
Thank you for using SmartServe.

intents.description: Provider messages customer.
responses: Use the chat feature on the booking page to communicate. Keep all communication professional.
You can share updates, ask questions, or confirm details.
Avoid sharing personal contact info until after booking.

intents.description: Provider calls customer via app.
responses: You can request a call through the app. We'll connect you using masked numbers to protect privacy.
The customer will receive a call request.
Use this for urgent matters.

intents.description: Provider reports customer issue.
responses: Please report any issues from the booking page. Our team will investigate.
If you feel unsafe, you can cancel the booking and contact support immediately.
Your safety is our priority.

intents.description: Provider blocks customer.
text: don't want to work with them
responses: After the booking, you can block the customer from your dashboard. They won't be able to book you again.
You can unblock them later if desired.
Blocking is a personal preference and won't affect your ratings.

intents.description: Provider favorites customer.
responses: You can add customers to your favorites. They'll receive a notification and you'll be prioritized when they book.
Favoriting helps build long-term relationships.
Manage favorites in your dashboard.

intents.description: Provider manages schedule.
responses: In your dashboard, go to 'Schedule' to set your working hours and block out times.
Keep your calendar updated to avoid double bookings.
You can also set recurring availability.

intents.description: Provider sets holiday.
responses: You can mark specific dates as unavailable in your schedule. Or turn on 'Vacation Mode' to pause all bookings.
Vacation mode hides your profile until you return.
Don't forget to turn it off when you're back!

intents.description: Provider sets working hours.
responses: Go to 'Schedule' > 'Working Hours' to set your regular hours for each day of the week.
Customers will only see available slots within these hours.
You can override for specific days as needed.

intents.description: Provider sets service area.
responses: Define your service area in 'Settings' > 'Service Area'. You can set a radius or specific cities.
Customers outside this area won't see you.
You can also set travel fees for longer distances.

intents.description: Provider sets travel fee.
responses: You can add a travel fee in 'Pricing'. It can be a flat rate or per mile/km.
Customers will see this fee before booking.
Adjust based on your costs.

intents.description: Provider updates prices.
responses: In 'Services', you can edit the price for each service you offer. You can set hourly or fixed rates.
Consider market rates and your experience when pricing.
Changes apply to future bookings only.

intents.description: Provider updates service description.
responses: You can edit the description of each service in the 'Services' section. Describe what you do and your expertise.
A clear, detailed description attracts the right customers.
Include any specializations or equipment you use.

intents.description: Provider adds service photos.
responses: In 'Portfolio' or when editing a service, you can add photos showcasing your work. High-quality images build trust.
Add before/after shots to demonstrate results.
Photos can make your profile stand out.

intents.description: Provider adds videos.
responses: You can upload a short introduction video or work samples in your portfolio. Videos engage customers.
Keep videos professional and under 2 minutes.
Videos are a great way to showcase personality.

intents.description: Provider uploads documents (certificates).
responses: Upload relevant certificates in the 'Documents' section. This helps with verification and builds credibility.
Customers can see verified documents on your profile.
Keep them up to date.

intents.description: Provider lists services.
responses: You can manage the list of services you offer in the 'Services' section. Add or remove as needed.
Make sure your services match your skills and licenses.
You can also create packages.

intents.description: Provider adds a new service.
responses: In 'Services', tap 'Add Service'. Choose a category, set price, and write a description.
You can add multiple services to reach more customers.
Ensure you're qualified for each service you add.

intents.description: Provider removes a service.
responses: In 'Services', you can deactivate or delete a service. It will no longer appear in search.
If you have existing bookings for that service, they will still be honored.
Consider pausing instead of deleting if you might offer it again.

intents.description: Provider creates discount.
responses: You can create promotions in the 'Marketing' section. Set a discount percentage and duration.
Promotions can attract new customers and increase bookings.
Promoted services get a special badge.

intents.description: Provider issues coupons.
responses: Generate coupon codes for your customers in 'Marketing'. Share them via chat or social media.
Coupons can be one-time or limited-time.
Track redemptions in your dashboard.

intents.description: Provider gets referral code.
responses: You can refer other professionals to join SmartServe. Get your unique referral code in the 'Referrals' section.
Earn bonuses when they complete their first booking.
Share your code with colleagues.

intents.description: Provider downloads earnings report.
responses: In 'Earnings', you can generate a report for any date range and download it as PDF or CSV.
Useful for taxes and business tracking.
Reports include all transactions and fees.

intents.description: Provider requests tax statement.
responses: Tax statements for the previous year are available in January. Download from the 'Tax Info' section.
For US providers, we provide 1099 forms if you earned over $600.
Contact support if you need a duplicate.

intents.description: Provider contacts support.
responses: For provider-specific help, use the 'Support' option in your dashboard. You can also email provider-support@smartserve.ai.
Our team is dedicated to assisting providers.
Include your provider ID for faster service.

intents.description: Provider asks for FAQ.
responses: Visit the Provider FAQ in the Help Center. It covers payments, verification, cancellations, and more.
Many common questions are answered there.
If you can't find an answer, contact support.

intents.description: Provider asks for terms.
responses: You can review the Provider Terms of Service in the app under 'Legal' or on our website.
It's important to understand your rights and obligations.
Contact support if you have questions about the terms.

intents.description: Provider asks about insurance requirements.
responses: Insurance requirements vary by service category. Generally, liability insurance is recommended and may be required for certain jobs.
Check your category guidelines in the provider handbook.
Having insurance can increase customer trust.

intents.description: Provider asks about quality standards.
responses: We expect all providers to deliver high-quality work, be punctual, and communicate professionally.
Our quality guidelines are in the provider handbook.
Maintaining high standards leads to better reviews and more bookings.

intents.description: Provider asks about code of conduct.
responses: Our code of conduct outlines expected behavior: respect, honesty, reliability, and safety.
Violations may result in account suspension.
Please review it in the provider resources.

intents.description: Provider asks for training.
responses: Access training materials in the 'Learning Center' of your dashboard. Topics include customer service, safety, and business tips.
We regularly add new content.
Completing training can earn you badges.

intents.description: Provider asks about community guidelines.
responses: Our community guidelines promote respectful and helpful interactions. Read them in the community section.
Violations may lead to removal from the community.
Be kind and supportive.

intents.description: Provider asks about webinars.
responses: We host regular webinars for providers. Check the 'Events' tab in your dashboard for upcoming sessions.
Webinars cover topics like maximizing earnings, handling difficult customers, and using app features.
Recordings are available afterward.

intents.description: Provider wants news.
responses: Stay updated with provider news via the dashboard announcements or our provider newsletter.
We share new features, policy changes, and tips.
Check the 'News' section regularly.

intents.description: Provider asks about app updates.
responses: We regularly update the app. You'll be notified of major changes. Check the app store for the latest version.
Update notes are available in the 'What's New' section.
Keep your app updated for the best experience.

intents.description: Provider gives feedback.
responses: We value your feedback! Use the 'Feedback' option in your dashboard to share your thoughts.
Your input helps us improve the provider experience.
Thank you for helping us grow.

intents.description: Provider reports bug.
responses: Please report bugs via 'Support' > 'Report a Bug'. Include screenshots and steps to reproduce.
We'll investigate and fix as soon as possible.
Thank you for your help in improving the app.

intents.description: Provider suggests feature.
responses: We love ideas! Submit your feature request via 'Feedback' in the dashboard.
Our product team reviews all suggestions.
Thank you for helping shape the future of SmartServe.

intents.description: Provider deletes account.
responses: We're sorry to see you go. You can delete your provider account from 'Settings' > 'Account' > 'Delete Account'.
Please ensure all pending payments are settled.
Once deleted, this cannot be undone.

intents.description: Provider's account suspended.
responses: If your account was suspended, you should have received an email with the reason. You can appeal by contacting support.
Provide any relevant information to help us review.
We take suspensions seriously and investigate thoroughly.

intents.description: Provider requests reinstatement.
responses: To request reinstatement, please contact provider support with your account details and reason.
We'll review your case and get back to you.
If you've resolved the issue, we may reinstate your account.

intents.description: Provider switches to customer mode.
responses: You can switch to customer mode by tapping your profile icon and selecting 'Switch to Customer'.
Now you can book services like any customer.
Switch back anytime from the same menu.

intents.description: Customer switches to provider.
responses: Ready to start offering services? Go to 'My Account' and select 'Become a Provider'.
Follow the verification steps to set up your pro profile.
Once approved, you can switch between modes.
